languages.text: "Я больше не нуждаюсь в личной прислуге. Обсуди с Данроком иные способы приносить пользу экипажу".

traits.locale_text: "Я больше не нуждаюсь в личной прислуге. Обсуди с Данроком иные способы приносить пользу экипажу".

languages.text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."
languages.original_text: "Я больше не нуждаюсь в личной прислуге. Обсуди с Данроком иные способы приносить пользу экипажу".

traits.locale_text: "I no longer need a personal servant. Go to Danrok and discuss other ways you could be useful to the crew."
"I no longer need a personal servant. Go to Danrok and discuss other ways you could be useful to the crew."
"I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."
"I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."
"I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."
"I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

languages.text: "Ich brauche keine Leibdienerin mehr. Geht zu Danrok und findet heraus, wo Ihr Euch für die Crew noch nützlich machen könnt."
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Ich brauche keine Leibdienerin mehr. Geht zu Danrok und findet heraus, wo Ihr Euch für die Crew noch nützlich machen könnt."

languages.text: « Je n'ai plus besoin d'une servante personnelle. Allez demander à Danrok ce que vous pouvez faire pour vous rendre utile. »
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai plus besoin d'une servante personnelle. Allez demander à Danrok ce que vous pouvez faire pour vous rendre utile. »

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}にはもう専属使用人は必要ない。ダンロックのところへ行って、乗組員の役に立ちそうな別の仕事を探してくれ」
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}にはもう専属使用人は必要ない。ダンロックのところへ行って、乗組員の役に立ちそうな別の仕事を探してくれ」

languages.text: «Ya no necesito sirviente personal. Vaya con Danrok y busque dónde más puede ayudar a la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no necesito sirviente personal. Vaya con Danrok y busque dónde más puede ayudar a la tripulación».

languages.text: “我已经不需要私人仆从了。去找丹罗克吧，看看他需不需要你去别的地方帮忙。”
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: “我已经不需要私人仆从了。去找丹罗克吧，看看他需不需要你去别的地方帮忙。”

languages.text: "Artık kişisel hizmetkâra ihtiyacım yok. Danrok'a git, seni başka bir işte görevlendirsin."
languages.original_text: "I no longer require a personal servant. Go to Danrok and find out where else you might be useful to the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Artık kişisel hizmetkâra ihtiyacım yok. Danrok'a git, seni başka bir mevkide görevlendirsin."
